attributes.title: This app RUINED my phone
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for information on Trump’s policies and it had nothing but blatant propaganda. It started making my phone crash as well. I deleted it, and then everything went back to normal. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.

attributes.title: Ate my donkey
attributes.review:
So I downloaded the app and as soon as I opened it to see ~✨mr.presidents fat bussy 😖🤤✨~ my phone EXPLODED and a dark blue goo erupted from the speaker!!! So naturally, I tried licking it and it slapped my ear. It made its way over to my donkey cage and CONSUMED THE ENTIRE CAGE! I am now in total despair over the loss of donny troomp, my favorite jack ass😔. I will be burying him after I take my fish for a walk on sunday and will leave a cactus on his grave the day of inauguration for the next president, which will very obviously be bi-UH TRUMP.... anyways, keep your donkeys away from your phone when you open the app darlings!! 💖💖💞 stay safe bb’s😘🥰
      -pickle

attributes.title: American phone was hacked
attributes.review: Hello. I downloaded this app because at this current date in time, it is a fact that Donald Trump is President of the USA. As an American citizen, i wanted to hear how Trump advertised himself to the people. I was very troubled to see that they wanted my information and my app kept crashing. It was extremely concerning and I was very scared. I noticed an extremely subtle and faded flashing dot on my screen after i downloaded the app. After searching up all of the details on google, I REALIZED ID BEEN HACKED! I downloaded a program of sorts to tell me for sure if I had a virus and they said someone had hacked me and gathered my information. Please don’t let this app steal anyone else’s info

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review:
Everything about this app is just awful. The lay out, the style and design. And most of all it is for a racist dictator. Terrible. DO NOT DOWNLOAD! It is a RACIST, HOMOPHOBIC, AND SEXIST APP. IT IS FOR A CHILD RAPIST. 

But ya, the app is horrible and there are many glitches.
